hotels.title: Modern Japan Elegance in Kashihara Nara with Traditional Hot Spring Onsen
hotels.description: Experience a fusion of modern luxury and traditional charm in Japan's ancient capital, Nara. This elegant retreat is perfectly positioned for exploring the Kansai region's rich history, with the UNESCO World Heritage-listed temples of Kyoto, deer-filled parks of Nara City and iconic eating streets of Osaka all easily accessed by rail. After a day of sightseeing, soak in serenity at the hotel's very own hot spring baths and indulge in bliss at the sauna before unwinding at the Onsen Lounge with a refreshing drink.

hotels.title: Contemporary Japan Escape in Nara with Onsite Restaurant & Wellness Lounge
hotels.description: Immerse yourself in Japan's ancient capital with a stay at this contemporary Novotel gem. Savour Italian flavours with a local twist at the onsite Trattoria Ponte Nara restaurant, before indulging in pure relaxation at the onsite Wellness Lounge, complete with Japanese-style public baths. The hotel's prime location places you within easy reach of sought-after spots, including Nara Park and its friendly deer, Todai-ji Temple and more. After a day of exploring, come back to homey rooms, pleasing decor and world-class amenities for a relaxing stay.
